changeSet.author: Suraj

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'Yes', 'No' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" ) AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Prep Cont Form, Has the client defaulted treatment for more than 28 days?");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "Prep Cont Form, Has the client defaulted treatment for more than 28 days?"
